[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/sim.rs] [Function: ViewResource::execute()] [Session Read Race] Can viewing resources while another process modifies the session cause reading partially written data or corrupted JSON? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/sim.rs] [All Commands] [File Locking] Do session operations use proper file locking to prevent concurrent access issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/sim.rs] [Function: Init::execute()] [State Replay] Can an attacker fork from an old network_version and replay historical transactions to find vulnerabilities that existed in past protocol versions? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/sim.rs] [Function: Fund::execute()] [Balance Replay] Can an attacker create a session, fund accounts, copy session files, then reload them multiple times to simulate different scenarios with same initial funding? (Low)
